llm.emotional_summary: I felt mostly relieved that I completed the application, but also a little frustrated by the income field error.
llm.overall_experience_feedback: The application process was quite straightforward, although I did encounter a small hiccup with the income field.  I was initially concerned when it rejected my input with the comma, as I usually use commas in large numbers.  After removing the comma, the application worked fine, but it made me wonder if there was any clearer guidance on the correct format. I took my time to read everything carefully, which probably added to my overall time. I'm glad it finally submitted correctly, though, and I'm happy I completed it without too much trouble.
suggestions: Provide clearer instructions on the formatting requirements for numerical fields, such as the income field, to help prevent user errors.  Perhaps provide examples or use input masks to guide users.
Consider adding a progress bar to show users how far along they are in the application process. This would help alleviate any anxiety and provide a clear sense of completion.
